reviewText: I grew up loving this cartoon as a kid in the 80s, I always loved soldier animation like, Gi joe, Rambo, & Spiral zone, it had a realness to it that can't be denied, I wish it could come out on dvd, this cartoon could easily be made into a movie, soldiers protecting people from getting zombieized, & controlled by Overlord, I'd love to play Overlord in a real life movie, but anyway great series, wish I could see more.
